of 4, 12, 47, 63, 80, 98, 106, 160, 172, 191, 277, 280, 287, 309, 317, 331, 334, 347, 369, 381, 443, 464, 487, 507, 536, 545, 553, 582, 617, 629, 663, 716, 758, 769, 780, 821, 861, 882, 905, 925, 939, 949, 965, 969, 974, 989, 1021, 1061, 1066, 1127, 1147, 1159, 1170, 1188, 1197, 1217, 1227, 1247, 1266, 1282, 1292, 1309, 1323, 1341, 1408, 1487, 1551, 1580, 1595, 1609, 1666, 1670, 1677, 1703, 1749, 1789, 1823, 1876, 1883, 1893, 1905, 1913, 1925, 1948, 1951, 2004, 2060, 2134, 2158, 2173, 2196, 2204, 2227, 2232, 2251, 2261, 2269, 2282, 2352, 2374, 2429, 2446, 2463, 2501, 2541, 2555, 2590, 2599, 2623, 2634, 2672, 2742, 2749, 2756, 2854, 2877, 2887, 2904, 2915, 2926, 2934, 2946, 3000, 3064, 3069, 3077, 3090, 3143, 3203, 3225, 3234, 3246, 3252, 3266, 3270, 3277, 3307, 3331, 3345, 3377, 3409, 3428, 3519, 3590, 3595, 3620, 3635
